body.p: Louisville, Jefferson County, Kentucky, physician. Danville, Boyle County, Kentucky, native. Married to Cordelia L. Talbot Pyles in Jefferson County, Kentucky, on April 1, 1847. Father of John L. Pyles, Madison Pyles, Jr., Talvert Pyles, and Lillie R. Pyles. Physician in Jefferson County in 1850. Owned four enslaved persons in Jefferson County in 1850. Physician in Jefferson County in 1860. Owned five enslaved persons in Jefferson County in 1860.
